thread.title: Doom 3 Mods on Total PC Gaming magazine.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Hi everybody,

I'm just here to let you know that Total PC Gaming magazine will do a special report on Doom 3 mods, issue 12, which goes on sale, in the UK, October 3rd.
It will feature Mods (like 6th Venom's Doom 3 HQ Mainmenu ) on the magazine's DVD within the mods section.

If someone could check it out, cause i'm not living in UK, and give some feedbacks, i'll thank him a lot!
